item.title: 2022 n00bzCTF Write up

item.title: 2022 FoobarCTF Write up
item.description: Summary TEAM : DEMON Rank : 13th Web Find My Location Node.JS Prototype Pollution const express = require('express'); const bodyParser = require('body-parser'); const cors = require('cors'); const app = express(); const cookieParser = require('cookie-parser'); app.use(cookieParser()); app.use(express.json()) app.set('view engine', 'ejs'); const port = process.env.PORT || 3000 app.use(express.static(__dirname + '/public')); app.use(cors()) const users = [ { name: 'user', password: 'pwd' }, { name: 'admin', password: Math.random().toString(32), isAdmin: true }, ]; const myLoaction = [ { flag: "GLUG{f4k3_fl4g_f0r_t3st1ng}" } ] function findUser(auth) { return users.

item.title: 2020 DIMICTF WEB WRITE UP
item.description: WEB 5shared <?php require_once 'lib.php'; session_start(); $session = md5(session_id()); $uploaddir = __DIR__ . "/~uploads/{$session}/"; createDirectory(__DIR__ . "/~uploads/"); createDirectory($uploaddir); //print_r($_FILES['file']); $file = $_FILES['file']; $uploadfile = $uploaddir . $file['name']; // sanity check $extension = explode('.', $file['name'])[1]; if (!in_array($extension, Array("jpg", "gif", "png"))) { $message = "<script>alert('jpg, gif, png 확장자만 업로드할 수 있습니다.'); history.back(); </script>"; die($message); } // the real sanity check $real_extension = array_pop(explode('.', $file['name'])); if (preg_match("/php/i", $file['name'])) { $message = "<script>alert('파일 이름에 php가 들어가면 안됩니다.
